name: Cosmic Ark (C64 fangame)
description:
An unofficial remake of one of my favorite Atari 2600 games. I was actually pretty happy with how this turned out! Survive an asteroid onslaught and rescue alien critters from the planet's surface. 

(No instructions)

Made with Gary Kitchen's Game Maker.

This game is in D64 format and is meant to be run in a Commodore 64 emulator
